Title: L1Norm
Description: Calculates the sum of absolute values of a vector.
L1-norm or taxicab geometry distance. UInt, Float or Decimal.

Title: L2Norm
Description: Calculates the square root of the sum of the squares of the vector values.

Title: L2SquaredNorm
Description: Calculates the square root of the sum of the squares of the vector values (the L2Norm) squared.

Title: LinfNorm
Description: Calculates the maximum of absolute values of a vector.
Linf-norm or the maximum absolute value. Float.

Title: LpNorm
Description: Calculates the root of p-th power of the sum of the absolute values of a vector in the power of p.
vector — Tuple or Array.p — The power. Possible values: real number in [1; inf). UInt or Float.

Title: L1Distance
Description: Calculates the distance between two points (the values of the vectors are the coordinates) in L1 space (1-norm (taxicab geometry distance)).
vector1 — First vector. Tuple or Array.vector2 — Second vector. Tuple or Array.

Title: L2Distance
Description: Calculates the distance between two points (the values of the vectors are the coordinates) in Euclidean space (Euclidean distance).
vector1 — First vector. Tuple or Array.vector2 — Second vector. Tuple or Array.

Title: L2SquaredDistance
Description: Calculates the sum of the squares of the difference between the corresponding elements of two vectors.
vector1 — First vector. Tuple or Array.vector2 — Second vector. Tuple or Array.
Sum of the squares of the difference between the corresponding elements of two vectors. Float.

Title: LinfDistance
Description: Calculates the distance between two points (the values of the vectors are the coordinates) in L_{inf} space (maximum norm).
vector1 — First vector. Tuple or Array.vector1 — Second vector. Tuple or Array.

Title: LpDistance
Description: Calculates the distance between two points (the values of the vectors are the coordinates) in Lp space (p-norm distance).
vector1 — First vector. Tuple or Array.vector2 — Second vector. Tuple or Array.p — The power. Possible values: real number from [1; inf). UInt or Float.

Title: L1Normalize
Description: Calculates the unit vector of a given vector (the values of the tuple are the coordinates) in L1 space (taxicab geometry).

Title: L2Normalize
Description: Calculates the unit vector of a given vector (the values of the tuple are the coordinates) in Euclidean space (using Euclidean distance).

Title: LinfNormalize
Description: Calculates the unit vector of a given vector (the values of the tuple are the coordinates) in L_{inf} space (using maximum norm).

Title: LpNormalize
Description: Calculates the unit vector of a given vector (the values of the tuple are the coordinates) in Lp space (using p-norm).
tuple — Tuple.p — The power. Possible values: any number from [1;inf). UInt or Float.

Title: cosineDistance
Description: Calculates the cosine distance between two vectors (the values of the tuples are the coordinates). The smaller the returned value is, the more similar are the vectors.
vector1 — First tuple. Tuple or Array.vector2 — Second tuple. Tuple or Array.
Cosine of the angle between two vectors subtracted from one. Float.
